participant_1.name: Arjun
participant_1.personality: Free-spirited and passionate about music and swimming, Arjun enjoys exploring new ideas and loves spending time with his family.
participant_1.background: my favorite music genre is death metal. my family and i are from india. i'm studying to be a computer programmer. i am a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited.

participant_2.name: Lisa
participant_2.personality: Lisa is an active and nurturing individual who enjoys outdoor activities and values a healthy lifestyle. As a single mom, she balances her studies and parenting with grace.
participant_2.background: i like to take walks. i don't drink soda. i live in a house. i like to eat hamburgers and french fries.

content.text: I am great today. I drink tea and you
I am good. I just got done swimming.
I just ate hamburgers and french fries. Normally I have to drink soda.
I love soda and I am a coach at the pool.

I do, I am in the midwest.
